title: OK riddle you this what do you do when
body: A Kat thats 4/4 and a garen show up to your lane and noone on your team in anywhere near yout tower. just alt f4 because garen is about to flash silence and then kat insta kills you. then tis game over. Cuz garen just shows up to tank which i assure you he can tank that bitch for about 2 hours. lmfao doing it riot.

replies.body: Give up tower and farm lane after. Place wards between jungle and botlane.  Support your team win. Also don't give Kat 1 kill in lane. Not even 1

You die.

And then you accept that its a team game and if your team is overall worse then theirs then you deserve to lose.
